metadata.name: #1 Mind Bloom
metadata.description:
This is the genesis piece of the Mind Bloom series; the first signal from the other world. In our decay and in our faults, we can still bring forth beautiful things to our world.

To the first owner of this piece, I will give you the following if desired:
-Full project file (AE, assets)
-Hi-res .mov render
-Hi-res .gif render
-Hi-res .jpg renders

This is the first of the bloom.
